The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud
at the target.
This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: poison-tail
title: Poison Tail
effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
flavor_text:
The user hits the target with its tail.
This may also poison the target.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: covet
title: Covet
effect_short: Takes the target's item.
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding an item and the user is not, the user will permanently take the item.  Damage is still inflicted if an item cannot be taken.

Pokémon with sticky hold or multitype are immune to the item theft effect.

The target cannot recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
flavor_text:
The user endearingly approaches
the target, then steals the target’s
held item.

name: volt-tackle
title: Volt Tackle
effect_short: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
flavor_text:
The user electrifies itself, then charges.
This also damages the user quite a lot.
This may leave the target with paralysis.

name: magical-leaf
title: Magical Leaf
effect_short: Never misses.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
flavor_text:
The user scatters curious leaves
that chase the target.
This attack never misses.

name: water-sport
title: Water Sport
effect_short: Halves all Fire-type damage.
effect: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
flavor_text:
The user soaks itself with water.
This weakens Fire-type moves
for five turns.

name: calm-mind
title: Calm Mind
effect_short: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage each.
flavor_text:
The user quietly focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

name: leaf-blade
title: Leaf Blade
effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
flavor_text:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a
sword and attacks by cutting its target.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: dragon-dance
title: Dragon Dance
effect_short: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage each.
flavor_text:
The user vigorously performs a mystic,
powerful dance that raises its Attack and
Speed stats.

name: rock-blast
title: Rock Blast
effect_short: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
flavor_text:
The user hurls hard rocks at the target.
Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

name: shock-wave
title: Shock Wave
effect_short: Never misses.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
flavor_text:
The user strikes the target with a quick
jolt of electricity.
This attack never misses.

name: water-pulse
title: Water Pulse
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with
a pulsing blast of water.
This may also confuse the target.

name: doom-desire
title: Doom Desire
effect_short: Hits the target two turns later.
effect:
Inflicts typeless regular damage at the end of the third turn, starting with this one.  This move cannot score a critical hit.  If the target switches out, its replacement will be hit instead.  Damage is calculated at the time this move is used; stat changes and switching out during the delay won't change the damage inflicted.  No move with this effect can be used against the same target again until after the end of the third turn.

This effect breaks through wonder guard.

If the target is protected by protect or detect on the turn this move is used, this move will fail.  However, the damage on the third turn will break through protection.

The damage is applied at the end of the turn, so it ignores endure and focus sash.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
flavor_text:
Two turns after this move is used, the
user blasts the target with a
concentrated bundle of light.

name: psycho-boost
title: Psycho Boost
effect_short: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
flavor_text:
The user attacks the target at full power.
The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: roost
title: Roost
effect_short: Heals the user by half its max HP.
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.  If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.
flavor_text:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user’s HP by up to
half of its max HP.

name: gravity
title: Gravity
effect_short: Disables moves and immunities that involve flying or levitating for five turns.
effect:
For five turns (including this one), all immunities to ground moves are disabled.  For the duration of this effect, the evasion of every Pokémon on the field is lowered by two stages.  Cancels the effects of bounce, fly, and sky drop.

Specifically, flying Pokémon and those with levitate or that have used magnet rise are no longer immune to ground attacks, arena trap, spikes, or toxic spikes.

bounce, fly, sky drop, high jump kick, jump kick, and splash cannot be used while this move is in effect.

*Bug*: If this move is used during a double or triple battle while Pokémon are under the effect of sky drop, Sky Drop's effect is not correctly canceled on its target, and it remains high in the air indefinitely.  As Sky Drop prevents the target from acting, the only way to subsequently remove it from the field is to faint it.
flavor_text:
Gravity is intensified for five turns,
making moves involving flying unusable
and negating Levitate.

name: miracle-eye
title: Miracle Eye
effect_short: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark.
effect: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
flavor_text:
Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by
Psychic-type attacks. This also enables
an evasive target to be hit.

name: wake-up-slap
title: Wake-Up Slap
effect_short: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
flavor_text:
This attack inflicts big damage on a
sleeping target. This also wakes the target
up, however.

name: hammer-arm
title: Hammer Arm
effect_short: Lowers user's Speed by one stage.
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Speed by one stage.
flavor_text:
The user swings and hits with its strong
and heavy fist.
It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: gyro-ball
title: Gyro Ball
effect_short: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
flavor_text:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed
spin. The slower the user compared to the
target, the greater the move’s power.

name: healing-wish
title: Healing Wish
effect_short: User faints.  Its replacement has its HP fully restored and any major status effect removed.
effect: User faints.  Its replacement's HP is fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.  If the replacement Pokémon is immediately fainted by a switch-in effect, the next replacement is healed by this move instead.
flavor_text:
The user faints. In return, the Pokémon
taking its place will have its HP restored
and status conditions cured.

name: brine
title: Brine
effect_short: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
flavor_text:
If the target’s HP is half or less,
this attack will hit with double
the power.

name: natural-gift
title: Natural Gift
effect_short: Power and type depend on the held berry.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's held berry.  The berry is consumed.  If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.
flavor_text:
The user draws power to attack by using
its held Berry.
The Berry determines the move’s type and power.

name: feint
title: Feint
effect_short: Hits through Protect and Detect.
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
flavor_text:
An attack that hits a target using
Protect or Detect. This also lifts
the effects of those moves.

name: pluck
title: Pluck
effect_short: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
flavor_text:
The user pecks the target. If the target
is holding a Berry, the user eats it and
gains its effect.

name: tailwind
title: Tailwind
effect_short: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
effect: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the field have their original Speed doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
flavor_text:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed stat of the user and
its allies for four turns.

name: acupressure
title: Acupressure
effect_short: Raises one of a friendly Pokémon's stats at random by two stages.
effect:
Raises one of the target's stats by two stages.  The raised stat is chosen at random from any stats that can be raised by two stages.  If no stat is eligible, this move will fail.

If the target has a substitute, this move will have no effect, even if the user is the target.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
flavor_text:
The user applies pressure to stress
points, sharply boosting one of its or
its allies’ stats.

name: metal-burst
title: Metal Burst
effect_short: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
effect: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn.  Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
flavor_text:
The user retaliates with much greater
power against the opponent
that last inflicted damage on it.

name: u-turn
title: U-turn
effect_short: User must switch out after attacking.
effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain's effect will end.
flavor_text:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with
a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: close-combat
title: Close Combat
effect_short: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
flavor_text:
The user fights the target up close
without guarding itself. This also lowers
the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: payback
title: Payback
effect_short: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
flavor_text:
The user stores power, then attacks.
If the user moves after the target,
this attack’s power will be doubled.

name: assurance
title: Assurance
effect_short: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
flavor_text:
If the target has already taken some
damage in the same turn, this attack’s
power is doubled.

name: embargo
title: Embargo
effect_short: Target cannot use held items.
effect:
Target cannot use its held item for five turns.  If the target leaves the field, this effect ends.

If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used.  If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail.

This effect is passed by baton pass.
flavor_text:
This move prevents the target from
using its held item. Its Trainer is
also prevented from using items on it.

name: fling
title: Fling
effect_short: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's held item.  The item is consumed.  If the user is not holding an item, or its item has no set type and power, this move will fail.

This move ignores sticky hold.

If the user is under the effect of embargo, this move will fail.
flavor_text:
The user flings its held item at the target
to attack. This move’s power and effects
depend on the item.

name: psycho-shift
title: Psycho Shift
effect_short: Transfers the user's major status effect to the target.
effect: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user's status is transferred to the target.
flavor_text:
Using its psychic power of suggestion,
the user transfers its status conditions
to the target.

name: trump-card
title: Trump Card
effect_short: Power increases when this move has less PP, up to a maximum of 200.
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power is determined by the PP remaining for this move, after its PP cost is deducted.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

PP remaining | Power
------------ | ----:
4 or more	|	40
3			|	50
2			|	60
1			|	80
0			|   200

If this move is activated by another move, the activating move's PP is used to calculate power.
flavor_text:
The fewer PP this move has,
the greater its power.

name: heal-block
title: Heal Block
effect_short: Prevents target from restoring its HP for five turns.
effect: For the next five turns, the target may not use any moves that only restore HP, and move effects that heal the target are disabled.  Moves that steal HP may still be used, but will only inflict damage and not heal the target.
flavor_text:
For five turns, the user prevents the
opposing team from using any moves,
Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

name: wring-out
title: Wring Out
effect_short: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
flavor_text:
The user powerfully wrings the target.
The more HP the target has, the greater
the move’s power.

name: power-trick
title: Power Trick
effect_short: User swaps Attack and Defense.
effect:
The user's original Attack and Defense are swapped.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
flavor_text:
The user employs its psychic power to
switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

name: gastro-acid
title: Gastro Acid
effect_short: Nullifies target's ability until it leaves battle.
effect:
The target's ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
flavor_text:
The user hurls up its stomach acids on
the target. The fluid eliminates the effect
of the target’s Ability.

name: lucky-chant
title: Lucky Chant
effect_short: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.
effect: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
flavor_text:
The user chants an incantation toward
the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon
from landing critical hits.

name: me-first
title: Me First
effect_short: Uses the target's move against it before it attacks, with power increased by half.
effect:
If the target has selected a damaging move this turn, the user will copy that move and use it against the target, with a 50% increase in power.

If the target moves before the user, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
flavor_text:
The user cuts ahead of the target to steal and
use the target’s intended move with greater power.
This move fails if it isn’t used first.

name: copycat
title: Copycat
effect_short: Uses the target's last used move.
effect:
Uses the last move that was used successfully by any Pokémon, including the user.

This move cannot copy itself, nor roar nor whirlwind.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
flavor_text:
The user mimics the move used immediately
before it. The move fails if no other move
has been used yet.

name: power-swap
title: Power Swap
effect_short: User swaps Attack and Special Attack changes with the target.
effect: User swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat modifiers modifiers with the target.
flavor_text:
The user employs its psychic power to
switch changes to its Attack and
Sp. Atk stats with the target.

name: guard-swap
title: Guard Swap
effect_short: User swaps Defense and Special Defense changes with the target.
effect: User swaps its Defense and Special Defense modifiers with the target.
flavor_text:
The user employs its psychic power to
switch changes to its Defense and
Sp. Def stats with the target.

name: punishment
title: Punishment
effect_short: Power increases against targets with more raised stats, up to a maximum of 200.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power starts at 60 and is increased by 20 for every stage any of the target's stats has been raised, capping at 200.  Accuracy and evasion modifiers do not increase this move's power.
flavor_text:
The more the target has powered
up with stat changes, the greater
the move’s power.

name: last-resort
title: Last Resort
effect_short: Can only be used after all of the user's other moves have been used.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  This move can only be used if each of the user's other moves has been used at least once since the user entered the field.  If this is the user's only move, this move will fail.
flavor_text:
This move can be used only after the user
has used all the other moves it knows
in the battle.

name: worry-seed
title: Worry Seed
effect_short: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.
effect:
Changes the target's ability to insomnia.

If the target's ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
flavor_text:
A seed that causes worry is planted on
the target. It prevents sleep by making
the target’s Ability Insomnia.

name: sucker-punch
title: Sucker Punch
effect_short: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

This move is not affected by iron fist.
flavor_text:
This move enables the user to attack
first. This move fails if the target is not
readying an attack.

name: toxic-spikes
title: Toxic Spikes
effect_short: Scatters poisoned spikes, poisoning opposing Pokémon that switch in.
effect:
Scatters poisoned spikes around the opposing field, which poison opposing Pokémon that enter the field.  A second layer of these spikes may be laid down, in which case Pokémon will be badly poisoned instead.  Pokémon immune to either ground moves or being poisoned are immune to this effect.  Pokémon otherwise immune to ground moves are affected during gravity.

If a poison Pokémon not immune to ground moves enters a field covered with poisoned spikes, the spikes are removed.

rapid spin will remove this effect from its user's side of the field.  defog will remove this effect from its target's side of the field.

This move does not trigger synchronize, unless the Pokémon with synchronize was forced to enter the field by another effect such as roar.

Pokémon entering the field due to baton pass are not affected by this effect.
flavor_text:
The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the
opposing team’s feet. They poison
opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: heart-swap
title: Heart Swap
effect_short: User and target swap stat changes.
effect: User swaps its stat modifiers with the target.
flavor_text:
The user employs its psychic power to
switch stat changes with the target.

name: aqua-ring
title: Aqua Ring
effect_short: Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.
effect:
Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP at the end of each turn.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
flavor_text:
The user envelops itself in a veil made
of water. It regains some HP every turn.

name: magnet-rise
title: Magnet Rise
effect_short: User is immune to Ground moves and effects for five turns.
effect:
For five turns, the user is immune to ground moves.

If the user is under the effect of ingrain or has levitate, this move will fail.

This effect is temporarily disabled by and cannot be used during gravity.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
flavor_text:
The user levitates using electrically
generated magnetism for five turns.

name: flare-blitz
title: Flare Blitz
effect_short: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
flavor_text:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot.
This may leave the target with a burn.

name: force-palm
title: Force Palm
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
flavor_text:
The target is attacked with a shock wave.
This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

name: aura-sphere
title: Aura Sphere
effect_short: Never misses.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
flavor_text:
The user lets loose a blast of aura power
from deep within its body at the target.
This attack never misses.

name: rock-polish
title: Rock Polish
effect_short: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
flavor_text:
The user polishes its body to reduce drag.
This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

name: poison-jab
title: Poison Jab
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
flavor_text:
The target is stabbed with a tentacle or
arm steeped in poison. This may also
poison the target.

name: dark-pulse
title: Dark Pulse
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
flavor_text:
The user releases a horrible aura imbued
with dark thoughts.
This may also make the target flinch.

name: night-slash
title: Night Slash
effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
flavor_text:
The user slashes the target
the instant an opportunity arises.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: aqua-tail
title: Aqua Tail
effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.
flavor_text:
The user attacks by swinging its tail as if
it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: seed-bomb
title: Seed Bomb
effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.
flavor_text:
The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled
seeds down on the target from above.

name: air-slash
title: Air Slash
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
flavor_text:
The user attacks with a blade of air that
slices even the sky. This may also make the
target flinch.

name: x-scissor
title: X-Scissor
effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.
flavor_text:
The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

name: bug-buzz
title: Bug Buzz
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
flavor_text:
The user vibrates its wings to generate a
damaging sound wave. This may also lower
the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: dragon-pulse
title: Dragon Pulse
effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.
flavor_text:
The target is attacked with a shock wave
generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

name: dragon-rush
title: Dragon Rush
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
flavor_text:
The user tackles the target while
exhibiting overwhelming menace.
This may also make the target flinch.

name: power-gem
title: Power Gem
effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.
flavor_text:
The user attacks with a ray of light that
sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: drain-punch
title: Drain Punch
effect_short: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
flavor_text:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.

name: vacuum-wave
title: Vacuum Wave
effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.
flavor_text:
The user whirls its fists to send a wave
of pure vacuum at the target.
This move always goes first.

name: focus-blast
title: Focus Blast
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
flavor_text:
The user heightens its mental focus and
unleashes its power.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: energy-ball
title: Energy Ball
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
flavor_text:
The user draws power from nature and
fires it at the target.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: brave-bird
title: Brave Bird
effect_short: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
flavor_text:
The user tucks in its wings and charges
from a low altitude.
This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: earth-power
title: Earth Power
effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

name: switcheroo
title: Switcheroo
effect_short: User and target swap items.
effect:
User and target permanently swap held items.  Works even if one of the Pokémon isn't holding anything.  If either Pokémon is holding mail, this move will fail.

If either Pokémon has multitype or sticky hold, this move will fail.

If this move results in a Pokémon obtaining choice band, choice scarf, or choice specs, and that Pokémon was the latter of the pair to move this turn, then the move it used this turn becomes its chosen forced move.  This applies even if both Pokémon had a choice item before this move was used.  If the first of the two Pokémon gains a choice item, it may select whatever choice move it wishes next turn.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
flavor_text:
The user trades held items with the target
faster than the eye can follow.

If the trainer chooses this move when it cannot be used, the choice is rejected outright and the trainer must choose another move.

Berry to use this move.
